aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon's Regulatory Compliance for Financial Services
Amazon provides regulated services in certain jurisdictions by enabling customer account balances.
Amazon provides regulated services in certain jurisdictions by enabling money transfers to third parties.
Amazon provides services to third parties to facilitate payments on their behalf.
Jurisdictions subject Amazon to requirements for licensing.
Jurisdictions subject Amazon to requirements for regulatory inspection.
Jurisdictions subject Amazon to requirements for bonding and capital maintenance.
Jurisdictions subject Amazon to requirements for the use of transferred funds.
Jurisdictions subject Amazon to requirements for the handling of transferred funds.
Jurisdictions subject Amazon to requirements for the segregation of transferred funds.
Jurisdictions subject Amazon to requirements for consumer disclosures.
Jurisdictions subject Amazon to requirements for maintaining data.
Jurisdictions subject Amazon to requirements for processing data.
Jurisdictions subject Amazon to requirements for authentication.
Amazon is subject to laws relating to payments.
Amazon is subject to laws relating to money laundering.
Amazon is subject to laws relating to international money transfers.
Amazon is subject to laws relating to privacy.
Amazon is subject to laws relating to data use.
Amazon is subject to laws relating to data protection.
Amazon is subject to laws relating to data security.
Amazon is subject to laws relating to data localization.
Amazon is subject to laws relating to network security.
Amazon is subject to laws relating to consumer protection.
Amazon is subject to laws relating to electronic fund transfers.
Amazon voluntarily complies with certain laws and regulations related to financial services.
If Amazon were found to be in violation of applicable laws or regulations, Amazon could be subject to additional requirements.
If Amazon were found to be in violation of applicable laws or regulations, Amazon could be subject to civil penalties.
If Amazon were found to be in violation of applicable laws or regulations, Amazon could be subject to criminal penalties.
If Amazon were found to be in violation of applicable laws or regulations, Amazon could be forced to cease providing certain services.

complement.value: violation of applicable laws or regulations

text: In addition, we provide regulated services in certain jurisdictions because we enable customers to keep account balances with us and transfer money to third parties, and because we provide services to third parties to facilitate payments on their behalf. Jurisdictions subject us to requirements for licensing, regulatory inspection, bonding and capital maintenance, the use, handling, and segregation of transferred funds, consumer disclosures, maintaining or processing data, and authentication. We are also subject to or voluntarily comply with a number of other laws and regulations relating to payments, money laundering, international money transfers, privacy, data use, data protection, data security, data localization, network security, consumer protection, and electronic fund transfers. If we were found to be in violation of applicable laws or regulations, we could be subject to additional requirements and civil and criminal penalties, or forced to cease providing certain services.
